title: Did anyone ever digitize Skizze
content:
I just saw a thread on myfonts.com and I really like the script.  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/viewthread.php?threadid=119017](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018074123/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/viewthread.php?threadid=119017 "http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/viewthread.php?threadid=119017")

I was wondering if anyone here knew if it was digitized.  
 [http://www.bleisetzer.de/cms/front\_content.php?idcat=57&idart=995](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018074123/http:/www.bleisetzer.de/cms/front_content.php?idcat=57&idart=995 "http://www.bleisetzer.de/cms/front\_content.php?idcat=57&idart=995")

Thank you in advance for you help.
author: Jackie Frant

comments.content:
I have no idea, but if you do it make it so that it is free. Is the only way I can get it.

Georg's present. Thank you sir.

André

I don’t think so. Here’s a [list of typefaces [PDF]](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018074123/http:/www.klingspor-museum.de/KlingsporKuenstler/Schriftdesigner/Hoehnisch/Hoehnisch.pdf) designed by [Walter Höhnisch](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018074123/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Walter%20H%C3%B6hnisch), compiled by [Klingspor-Museum Offenbach](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018074123/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Klingspor%20Museum) ( [http://www.klingspor-museum.de/Kuenstler.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018074123/http:/www.klingspor-museum.de/Kuenstler.html "http://www.klingspor-museum.de/Kuenstler.html")).

André: <cite>but if you do it make it so that it is free. Is the only way I can get it.</cite>

Why is that? Because you don’t wanna spend a single dime on fonts?

For what it’s worth: if you, Jackie, do so, make sure you don’t violate anybody’s rights, to take your time and design a decent version that people will gladly pay for, and to include all the original ligatures and alternates (at least).

No! I am actually thinking on having links to font founders in my up coming site, and persuade my client to buy them! And freefonts are always welcome. I will not use the freefont in my designs (I can make my own). Some good scripts out there get to be bought!  
Right?
